content.query:
Use nyc_taxi_discovery;
--------------------------JSON_VALUE-----------------------LOWPERFORMANCE----------------
SELECT CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') as SMALLINT) payment_type,
       CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc') as VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc
 FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK  'payment_type.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
 )
 WITH 
 (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
 )
 
  as payment_type

  -------------------------------------OPEN JSON---------------------------------
  SELECT payment_type,payment_type_desc as description
 FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK  'payment_type.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
 )
 WITH 
 (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
 )
 
  as payment_type
 CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
 WITH (
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_desc VARCHAR(20) 
      )

---------------READING JSON WITH ARRAYS-----------
SELECT *
 FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK  'payment_type_array.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
 )
 WITH 
 (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
 )
 
  as payment_type
 CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
 WITH (
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) as JSON
      )
 CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
WITH (
    sub_type SMALLINT,
    value VARCHAR(20)

)
